pkgmetadata.longdescription: Non Linear Time Series Analysis // Models for time series forecasting and causality detection. The main functionalities of this package consist of a neural network Vector Auto- Regressive model, the classical causality test C.W.J.Granger (1980) doi:10.1016/0165-1889(80)90069-X, and a non-linear version of it based on feed-forward neural networks.
